# Figure 1

```{r fig.height=12, fig.width=6}

library(png)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)

plot1 <- rasterGrob(readPNG("./Figures/xeno_treatment_umap.png"))
plot2 <- rasterGrob(readPNG("./Figures/xeno_patient_umap.png"))
```

```{r}
pdf(file = "./Figures/fig1",height = 12,width = 6)
grid.arrange(plot1,plot2)
dev.off()
```
